attributes.contentHtml: Zachery You were saying it like no sales happened when you weren't too. Which was incorrect, at this point your spitting lies. Can you back up what you say? I know you were finance, not marketing. But your saying like we got no sales while you were not finance, which is incorrect. I'll say it again.
